cab.content: WESTERN FRONT.M French Front. There is no material change In the situation. The French have effected further crossings of the RIVER VESLE at FISMETTE, (north of FISMES), and in the neighbourhood of BAZOCHES.M British Front. An attempt made yesterday by the enemy to capture one of our posts east of MERRIS was repulsed. Our troops captured a few. prisoners and machine guns last night in the NIEPPE FOREST sector. Enemy artillery has been active with gas shelling north of VILLERS BRETONNE UK, and has also shown activity about BtJOQUOY and north of BETHUNE.ITALIAN AND MACEDONIAN FRONTS.There is no change in the situation.General Staff, War Office, S.W.1.6th August, 1918. Issued at 12*15 pan.
